ContentDesc_Seiryu: The faux commander yearns for a tale of undying vengeance, and as you revisit your numerous memories of such, you recall the auspice Seiryu and his single-minded desire to destroy his loathed foe. Your mind's eye brings that furious encounter to vivid life, and you find yourself facing the mighty being once more in a bid to quell his aramitama ere it consumes him...
